items.title: Trump expands travel ban to 39 countries after shooting of Guard members
items.description: The administration added 20 countries to the 19 whose citizens already faced full or partial restrictions on entering the United States.

items.title: Coast Guard enacts policy calling swastikas, nooses ‘potentially divisive’
items.description: The Coast Guard’s workplace harassment manual that downgrades the definition of swastikas and nooses quietly went into effect this week.
